snippet.title: Liyla and the Shadows of War Trailer
snippet.description:
When you live in war zone and death is hunting everyone, things will look different and choices become harder. Face your fate in an unjust war to survive with your family from the shadows of the evil. 

Time is running against you, your family is in danger and there is nowhere to hide or to do but to get them out of home through a hero journey to a safer place. 

Shooting and bombing everywhere and it will hunt you unless you make fast decisions as you progress through different events. These events are real and they will make you choose the hard way. Live or die!
This game is based on true events that happened in Gaza in 2014

Features:
 
A story that is based on real events
Challenging events awaiting for you
A true action adventure game based on real events

Download on Android 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.liyla.war

Download on iOS
https://itunes.apple.com/jo/app/liyla-and-the-shadows-of-war/id1100839270?mt=8

Game website:
http://liyla.org/

PressKit:
http://liyla.org/press-kit

Twitter 
https://twitter.com/Liylawar

Facebook
https://www.facebook.com/liylawar/
